strapiPost.title: All Included
strapiPost.content:
With days of events inspired by Welcoming America, Northwest Arkansas is participating in Welcoming Week, and it starts today! 

  • A week of engagement: To kick off the week there will be a livestream event today from 5-6p, and throughout the week there will be over 50 events and opportunities for you to be involved in and help provide a welcoming atmosphere for our community. 
  • The water's fine: Welcoming Week is a time for organizations and communities to come together with intention to include and build stronger connections with neighbors. EngageNWA has declared that #BelongingBeginsWithUs, and invites you to help make NWA a more welcoming place to be. 

To learn more and see the calendar of events, click HERE.
